text.section:
To apply for certification as a nutrient management consultant, an applicant shall:
Submit to the Department an application on the form the Department requires; and
Pay to the Department the certification fee stated in § 8-806 of this subtitle.

To apply for a license an applicant shall:
Submit to the Department an application on the form the Department requires; and
Pay to the Department the applicable license fee stated in § 8-806 of this subtitle.
The Department shall license a person who meets the requirements of this subtitle.
A certificate or license is issued for 1 year unless the certificate or license is renewed as provided by this subtitle.

section.section: The Department may issue a farm operator's plan development certificate to a person operating a farm for the development of that person's own nutrient management plan.
